dcterms:creator: E. S. Dellon

dcterms:description: This dataset includes esophageal biopsy samples used to establish updated international consensus diagnostic criteria for eosinophilic esophagitis.
dcterms:title: Eosinophilic Esophagitis Biopsy Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. H. Collins
E. M. Stucke
K. E. Clarridge
C. J. Henderson
L. J. Martin
M. E. Rothenberg
dcterms:description: A newly developed and validated histology scoring system for eosinophilic esophagitis that outperforms peak eosinophil count for disease diagnosis and monitoring.
dcterms:title: Eosinophilic Esophagitis Histology Scoring System (HSS)

dcterms:creator: E. M. Stucke
K. E. Clarridge
M. H. Collins
C. J. Henderson
L. J. Martin
M. E. Rothenberg
dcterms:description: This dataset evaluates the value of an additional review for eosinophil quantification in esophageal biopsies.
dcterms:title: Peak Eosinophil Count (PEC) Dataset
